survey_name: Employee Satisfaction with On-Demand Professional Development Platforms Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to evaluate employee satisfaction with on-demand professional development platforms provided by the company, focusing on usability, content quality, and impact on career growth.

questions.question_text: How often do you use the company-provided on-demand professional development platform?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice radio button for this question to ensure clarity and ease of response.

script.question_text: How often do you use the company-provided on-demand professional development platform?

questions.question_text: Which features of the platform do you find most useful? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Use a multi-choice checkbox format for this question to allow multiple selections.

script.question_text: Which features of the platform do you find most useful? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the quality of content available on the platform?
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale for this question to measure satisfaction levels effectively.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the quality of content available on the platform?

questions.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for the professional development platform?
questions.client_notes: This open-ended question allows respondents to provide detailed feedback.

script.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for the professional development platform?

questions.question_text: Has the platform helped you in achieving your career development goals?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice radio button for this question to gauge impact.

script.question_text: Has the platform helped you in achieving your career development goals?
